description:
From their law office on Bainbridge Island in Washington state, the attorneys at Otorowski Morrow & Golden, PLLC, provide invaluable advocacy and support to clients throughout their region and beyond who suffered an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. With an additional law office in Seattle, they have become one of the premier legal practices in the area for individuals and families who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Medical malpractice
  • Automobile and trucking accidents
  • Burns
  • Construction injuries
  • Defective products
  • Other preventable tragedies

Combined, their attorneys possess more than 120 years of total legal experience, so you know that you will receive the highest level of counsel regarding your legal challenge. In addition, they have an on-site consulting physician and two attorneys with the registered nursing experience to better address the medical aspects of your claim and ensure you receive the proper care you need.

To date, the firm's lawyers have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for their plaintiff clients, and they have handled serious personal injury, medical malpractice and wrongful death claims in Idaho, California, Colorado, Alaska and Oregon. Honored for their success, their lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from their peers, and they have enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients.

To find out more about how the dedicated legal professionals at Otorowski Morrow & Golden, PLLC, can best assist you with securing the justice you deserve, you can contact their law office or visit their website to schedule a free initial consultation. They also offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your family members safe and healthy.
